11.title: The Un-Roast of Charlie Sheen
11.plot: Dr. Leigh-Davis dissects the ever crumbling life of actor Charlie Sheen.

16.title: Is Justice Fair for Celebrities?
16.plot: Dr. Leigh-Davis is your legal analyst on this episode of the television show "The Legal Analyst." Dr. Leigh-Davis, legal analyst, asks the question: Is Justice Fair for Celebrities? Dr. Leigh-Davis analyzes historical celebrity cases, such as Paris Hilton, and more. Then, she ponders over the recent criminal charge reduction in Lindsay Lohan's case.

8.title: Barry Bonds Perjury Trial
8.plot: Barry Bonds, baseball, steroids, and perjury are in the mix on this episode of the television show "The Legal Analyst." Dr. Leigh-Davis is your legal analyst as we peruse the history of what led Barry Bonds to be off the baseball field and in the courtroom. Was Congressman Waxman acting in the best history of the country, when he decided to go after MLB? What effect will these perjury charges have on Barry Bond's future and career? Those questions and more will be answered on this episode of "The Legal Analyst" with Dr. Leigh-Davis.

locations: Rockefeller Center, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: On "The Legal Analyst" law professor, anthropologist, and retired attorney, Dr. Leigh-Davis gives you the legal spin on everything from celebrity gossip, to breaking news, to everyday matters. "Everything has a legal angle," is Dr. Leigh-Davis' favorite saying. http://www.DrLeigh-Davis.com Creative Endeavors' most popular productions are the television shows "The Legal Analyst" & "Profiles in Philanthropy;" and the radio shows "The Real Deal" & "Success Living."
